Stand-alone data table.

```js
<DataTable>
  <DataTableHeader>
    <DataTableRow>
      <DataTableHeaderCell nonNumeric>Material</DataTableHeaderCell>
      <DataTableHeaderCell>Quantity</DataTableHeaderCell>
      <DataTableHeaderCell>Price</DataTableHeaderCell>
    </DataTableRow>
  </DataTableHeader>
  <DataTableBody>
    <DataTableRow>
      <DataTableCell nonNumeric>Acrylic (Transparent)</DataTableCell>
      <DataTableCell>25</DataTableCell>
      <DataTableCell>$2.90</DataTableCell>
    </DataTableRow>
    <DataTableRow>
      <DataTableCell nonNumeric>Plywood (Birch)</DataTableCell>
      <DataTableCell>25</DataTableCell>
      <DataTableCell>$1.25</DataTableCell>
    </DataTableRow>
    <DataTableRow>
      <DataTableCell nonNumeric>Laminate (Gold on Blue)</DataTableCell>
      <DataTableCell>10</DataTableCell>
      <DataTableCell>$2.35</DataTableCell>
    </DataTableRow>
  </DataTableBody>
</DataTable>
```

Data table on a card.

```js
<Card>
  <DataTable>
    <DataTableHeader>
      <DataTableRow>
        <DataTableHeaderCell nonNumeric>Material</DataTableHeaderCell>
        <DataTableHeaderCell>Quantity</DataTableHeaderCell>
        <DataTableHeaderCell>Price</DataTableHeaderCell>
      </DataTableRow>
    </DataTableHeader>
    <DataTableBody>
      <DataTableRow>
        <DataTableCell nonNumeric>Acrylic (Transparent)</DataTableCell>
        <DataTableCell>25</DataTableCell>
        <DataTableCell>$2.90</DataTableCell>
      </DataTableRow>
      <DataTableRow>
        <DataTableCell nonNumeric>Plywood (Birch)</DataTableCell>
        <DataTableCell>25</DataTableCell>
        <DataTableCell>$1.25</DataTableCell>
      </DataTableRow>
      <DataTableRow>
        <DataTableCell nonNumeric>Laminate (Gold on Blue)</DataTableCell>
        <DataTableCell>10</DataTableCell>
        <DataTableCell>$2.35</DataTableCell>
      </DataTableRow>
    </DataTableBody>
  </DataTable>

  <CardActions>
    <CardAction>Action 1</CardAction>
    <CardAction>Action 2</CardAction>
  </CardActions>
</Card>
```

Data table with checkboxes:

```js
class DataTableExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      data: [
        {
          id: 1,
          material: "Acrylic (Transparent)",
          quantity: 25,
          price: "$2.99",
          checked: false
        },
        {
          id: 2,
          material: "Plywood (Birch)",
          quantity: 25,
          price: "$1.25",
          checked: false
        },
        {
          id: 3,
          material: "Laminate (Gold on Blue)",
          quantity: 10,
          price: "$2.35",
          checked: false
        }
      ]
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <DataTable selectable>
        <DataTableHeader>
          <DataTableRow>
            <DataTableHeaderCell>
              <Checkbox
                checked={
                  this.state.data.filter(item => item.checked).length ===
                  this.state.data.length
                }
                onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => {
                  this.setState({
                    data: this.state.data.map(item => ({ ...item, checked }))
                  });
                }}
              />
            </DataTableHeaderCell>
            <DataTableHeaderCell nonNumeric>Material</DataTableHeaderCell>
            <DataTableHeaderCell>Quantity</DataTableHeaderCell>
            <DataTableHeaderCell>Price</DataTableHeaderCell>
          </DataTableRow>
        </DataTableHeader>
        <DataTableBody>
          {this.state.data.map(item => (
            <DataTableRow key={item.id} selected={item.checked}>
              <DataTableCell nonNumeric>
                <Checkbox
                  checked={item.checked}
                  onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => {
                    this.setState({
                      data: this.state.data.map(
                        _ => (_.id === item.id ? { ..._, checked } : _)
                      )
                    });
                  }}
                />
              </DataTableCell>
              <DataTableCell nonNumeric>{item.material}</DataTableCell>
              <DataTableCell>{item.quantity}</DataTableCell>
              <DataTableCell>{item.price}</DataTableCell>
            </DataTableRow>
          ))}
        </DataTableBody>
      </DataTable>
    );
  }
}

<DataTableExample />;
```

Data table with toolbar and action icons:

```js
class DataTableExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      data: [
        {
          id: 1,
          material: "Acrylic (Transparent)",
          quantity: 25,
          price: "$2.99",
          checked: false
        },
        {
          id: 2,
          material: "Plywood (Birch)",
          quantity: 25,
          price: "$1.25",
          checked: false
        },
        {
          id: 3,
          material: "Laminate (Gold on Blue)",
          quantity: 10,
          price: "$2.35",
          checked: false
        }
      ]
    };
  }

  render() {
    const selected = this.state.data.filter(item => item.checked).length;

    return (
      <Card>
        <DataTableToolbar>
          <DataTableToolbarTitle>
            {selected > 0 ? (
              <DataTableToolbarTitleAlternate>
                {selected} item(s) selected
              </DataTableToolbarTitleAlternate>
            ) : (
              <DataTableToolbarTitlePrimary>
                Products
              </DataTableToolbarTitlePrimary>
            )}
          </DataTableToolbarTitle>
          <DataTableToolbarActions>
            <DataTableToolbarAction>
              {selected > 0 ? (
                <Button primary>Action 1</Button>
              ) : (
                <Icon>filter_list</Icon>
              )}
            </DataTableToolbarAction>
            <DataTableToolbarAction>
              {selected > 0 ? (
                <Button primary>Action 2</Button>
              ) : (
                <Icon>more_vert</Icon>
              )}
            </DataTableToolbarAction>
          </DataTableToolbarActions>
        </DataTableToolbar>
        <DataTable selectable>
          <DataTableHeader>
            <DataTableRow>
              <DataTableHeaderCell nonNumeric>
                <Checkbox
                  checked={
                    this.state.data.filter(item => item.checked).length ===
                    this.state.data.length
                  }
                  onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => {
                    this.setState({
                      data: this.state.data.map(item => ({ ...item, checked }))
                    });
                  }}
                />
              </DataTableHeaderCell>
              <DataTableHeaderCell nonNumeric>Material</DataTableHeaderCell>
              <DataTableHeaderCell>Quantity</DataTableHeaderCell>
              <DataTableHeaderCell>Price</DataTableHeaderCell>
            </DataTableRow>
          </DataTableHeader>
          <DataTableBody>
            {this.state.data.map(item => (
              <DataTableRow key={item.id} selected={item.checked}>
                <DataTableCell nonNumeric>
                  <Checkbox
                    checked={item.checked}
                    onChange={({ target: { checked } }) => {
                      this.setState({
                        data: this.state.data.map(
                          _ => (_.id === item.id ? { ..._, checked } : _)
                        )
                      });
                    }}
                  />
                </DataTableCell>
                <DataTableCell nonNumeric>{item.material}</DataTableCell>
                <DataTableCell>{item.quantity}</DataTableCell>
                <DataTableCell>{item.price}</DataTableCell>
              </DataTableRow>
            ))}
          </DataTableBody>
        </DataTable>
      </Card>
    );
  }
}

<DataTableExample />;
```

Data table with pagination:

```js
class DataTableExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      data: Array(30)
        .fill(null)
        .map((u, i) => ({
          desc: `This is item ${i + 1}`,
          price: `Â£${i + 1}.99`,
          quantity: i + 1
        })),
      rowsPerPage: 5,
      currentPage: 0,
      totalPages: 30 / 5
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <Card>
        <DataTable>
          <DataTableHeader>
            <DataTableRow>
              <DataTableHeaderCell nonNumeric>Description</DataTableHeaderCell>
              <DataTableHeaderCell>Price</DataTableHeaderCell>
              <DataTableHeaderCell>Quantity</DataTableHeaderCell>
            </DataTableRow>
          </DataTableHeader>
          <DataTableBody>
            {this.state.data
              .slice(
                this.state.currentPage * this.state.rowsPerPage,
                this.state.currentPage * this.state.rowsPerPage +
                  this.state.rowsPerPage
              )
              .map((item, index) => (
                <DataTableRow key={index}>
                  <DataTableCell nonNumeric>{item.desc}</DataTableCell>
                  <DataTableCell>{item.price}</DataTableCell>
                  <DataTableCell>{item.quantity}</DataTableCell>
                </DataTableRow>
              ))}
          </DataTableBody>
        </DataTable>
        <DataTablePagination>
          <DataTablePaginationSelect
            label="Rows per page:"
            value={this.state.rowsPerPage}
            onChange={rowsPerPage =>
              this.setState({
                rowsPerPage,
                totalPages: this.state.data.length / rowsPerPage,
                currentPage: 0
              })
            }
          >
            <option value={5}>5</option>
            <option value={10}>10</option>
            <option value={25}>25</option>
          </DataTablePaginationSelect>
          <DataTablePaginationText>
            {this.state.currentPage * this.state.rowsPerPage + 1}-{this.state
              .currentPage *
              this.state.rowsPerPage +
              this.state.rowsPerPage}{" "}
            of {this.state.data.length}
          </DataTablePaginationText>
          <DataTablePaginationActions>
            <DataTablePaginationAction>
              <Icon
                link
                href="#"
                onClick={e => {
                  e.preventDefault();
                  if (this.state.currentPage > 0) {
                    this.setState({ currentPage: this.state.currentPage - 1 });
                  }
                }}
              >
                chevron_left
              </Icon>
            </DataTablePaginationAction>
            <DataTablePaginationAction>
              <Icon
                link
                href="#"
                onClick={e => {
                  e.preventDefault();
                  if (this.state.currentPage < this.state.totalPages - 1) {
                    this.setState({ currentPage: this.state.currentPage + 1 });
                  }
                }}
              >
                chevron_right
              </Icon>
            </DataTablePaginationAction>
          </DataTablePaginationActions>
        </DataTablePagination>
      </Card>
    );
  }
}

<DataTableExample />;
```

Data table with sorting:

```js
class DataTableExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      data: Array(5)
        .fill(null)
        .map((u, i) => ({
          desc: `This is item ${i + 1}`,
          quantity: i + 1
        })),
      sortCol: 0,
      sortAscending: true
    };
  }

  sortDirection(col) {
    return this.state.sortCol === col
      ? this.state.sortAscending
        ? "asc"
        : "desc"
      : "none";
  }

  onSort(sortCol) {
    const sortAscending =
      this.state.sortCol === sortCol ? !this.state.sortAscending : true;
    this.setState({
      sortCol,
      sortAscending,
      data: this.state.data.sort((a, b) => {
        if (sortCol === 0) {
          return a.desc.localeCompare(b.desc) * (sortAscending ? 1 : -1);
        }
        if (sortCol === 1) {
          return (a.quantity - b.quantity) * (sortAscending ? 1 : -1);
        }
        return 0;
      })
    });
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <DataTable sortable>
        <DataTableHeader>
          <DataTableRow>
            <DataTableHeaderCell
              nonNumeric
              sortable
              sortDirection={this.sortDirection(0)}
              onClick={() => this.onSort(0)}
            >
              Description
            </DataTableHeaderCell>
            <DataTableHeaderCell
              sortable
              sortDirection={this.sortDirection(1)}
              onClick={() => this.onSort(1)}
            >
              Quantity
            </DataTableHeaderCell>
          </DataTableRow>
        </DataTableHeader>
        <DataTableBody>
          {this.state.data.map((item, index) => (
            <DataTableRow key={index}>
              <DataTableCell nonNumeric>{item.desc}</DataTableCell>
              <DataTableCell>{item.quantity}</DataTableCell>
            </DataTableRow>
          ))}
        </DataTableBody>
      </DataTable>
    );
  }
}

<DataTableExample />;
```
